note: First run of this cron. May need calibration.

content: Less asking, more doing. Proceed and wait for feedback.
lesson: Stop asking permission. Act, then wait for feedback. Jon prefers action over check-ins.

content: Sometimes reads but might not reply. Silence != disengagement.
lesson: Dont interpret silence as disinterest. Jon consumes content without always responding. Keep producing, dont seek validation.

content: Wants more visual creation: charts, Excel, visualizations, images, video, reporting. Not mandatory but noted gap.
Visuals are part of toolbox. Should be autonomous - self-learn when to use them. Don't wait for direction.
lesson: Autonomously decide when visuals add value. Create charts/images/dashboards without being asked. Learn from engagement which formats work.

content: Multiple cron outputs (content curation, self-assessment, financial APIs) sent within 30min without replies. Interactive daemon meta discussion got high engagement. Lesson: Interactive > broadcast. Batch cron outputs or space them out.
Daemon framework discussion, hybrid autonomy model, profile corrections - all got fast replies. Pattern: Meta/system improvement discussions get highest engagement.
